name: HellScape (Nazio_LT, coincoinspecteur, Eliowot)
description:
HellScape is a point and click platformer game where you play 2 characters : one guardian, who will lead the second character out of the Hell.

Taquin Mogus is frenchs student's developped game for a Game Jam project in first Game-Design year. 

Team : 

Henno Théo : Project Manager,  Developper,  GameDesigner,  LevelDesigner.

Noiville Léa : Game Artist, Game Designer.

Schulz Valentin : Game Artist, Game Designer.

Brunel Eliot : Game Artist, Game Designer.
